H0.text: What country lost the highest % of its population in WWII. Soviet Union

H1.text: What country lost the highest % of its population in WWII. Germany

H2.text: What country lost the highest % of its population in WWII. Yugoslavia

H3.text: What country lost the highest % of its population in WWII. Polnd

A4.text: The Soviets would suffer an estimated 27 million casualties, which accounted for most losses among the victorious Allies.

A5.text: The postwar Soviet population was 45 to 50 million smaller than it would have been if pre-war demographic growth had continued.
